solution_line_template: The total cost of the hip-hop classes is {hiphop_classes_per_week} * ${hiphop_class_cost} = $<<{hiphop_classes_per_week}*{hiphop_class_cost}={hiphop_total}>>{hiphop_total}
The total cost of the ballet classes is {ballet_classes_per_week} * ${ballet_class_cost} = $<<{ballet_classes_per_week}*{ballet_class_cost}={ballet_total}>>{ballet_total}
The total cost of the jazz class is {jazz_classes_per_week} * ${jazz_class_cost} = $<<{jazz_classes_per_week}*{jazz_class_cost}={jazz_total}>>{jazz_total}
The total cost of all of Lucia’s dance classes in one week is ${hiphop_total} + ${ballet_total} + ${jazz_total} = $<<{hiphop_total}+{ballet_total}+{jazz_total}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
